metadata.description:
Commemorative NFT art collection created from popular crypto moments. Art is generated from on-chain transaction data related to the moment in blockchain history. 

Collection 1 - DAO Hack

Transaction Hash: 0x0ec3f2488a93839524add10ea229e773f6bc891b4eb4794c3337d4495263790b

On June 17, 2016, 'The DAO' was subject to an attack, exploiting a combination of vulnerabilities, including the one concerning recursive calls, that resulted in the transfer of 3.6 Million Ether - which was around a third of the 11.5 Million Ether committed to The DAO - valued at the time at around $50M
metadata.name: Crypto Moments - Dao Hack #1

attributes.moment_value_involved: 3.6 Million Ether hack - valued at around $50M at the time and valued around $12B billion on mint.

attributes.moment_story: On June 17, 2016, 'The DAO' was subject to an attack, exploiting a combination of vulnerabilities, including the one concerning recursive calls, that resulted in the transfer of 3.6 Million Ether - which was around a third of the 11.5 Million Ether committed to The DAO - valued at the time at around $50M
